languages.text: Ambull Mother hides under ground and becomes untargetable and immune to damage. Removes all debuffs.

traits.locale_text: Ambull Mother hides under ground and becomes untargetable and immune to damage. Removes all debuffs.

languages.text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.
languages.original_text: Амбулл-матка зарывается под землю, а ее потомство выбирается на поверхность. Пока амбулл-матка под землей, она не получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и не может быть выбрана в качестве цели. Также с нее снимаются все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, ambull mother cannot neither be targeted nor damaged. All negative effects are removed from her.

The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

languages.text: Амбулл-матка зарывается под землю, а ее потомство выбирается на поверхность. Пока амбулл-матка под землей, она не получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и не может быть выбрана в качестве цели. Также с нее снимаются все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: Амбулл-матка зарывается под землю, а ее потомство выкапывается на поверхность. Пока амбулл-матка под землей, она не получает урон и не может быть выбрана в качестве цели. Также с нее снимаются все негативные эффекты.

languages.text: Anne ambul, çukur kazıp kendisini toprağa gömerek yavrularının yüzeye çıkmasına sebep olur. Anne ambul, yer altındayken hedeflenemez veya {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} almaz. Ayrıca tüm {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g} de ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: Anne ambul, çukur kazıp kendisini toprağa gömerek yavrularının yüzeye çıkmasına sebep olur. Anne ambul, yer altındayken hedeflenemez veya {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} almaz. Ayrıca tüm {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g} de ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: La madre ambull se mete bajo tierra, haciendo que su progenie salga a la superficie. Mientras esté bajo tierra, la madre ambull no puede seleccionarse como objetivo ni sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. También se eliminan todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: La madre ambull se mete bajo tierra, haciendo que su progenie salga a la superficie. Mientras esté bajo tierra, la madre ambull no puede seleccionarse como objetivo ni sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. También se eliminan todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}.

languages.text: 蚁牛族母钻入地下，命令蚁牛虫群钻出地面进行攻击。当蚁牛族母潜入地下时，它无法被指定为目标，也不会受到任何{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。除此之外，它身上所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}也会被移除。
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: 蚁牛族母钻入地下，命令蚁牛虫群钻出地面进行攻击。当蚁牛族母潜入地下时，它无法被指定为目标，也不会受到任何{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。除此之外，它身上所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}也会被移除。

languages.text: La mère ambull s'enfouit dans le sol et fait sortir sa progéniture à la surface. Tant qu'elle est sous terre, elle ne peut pas être visée ni subir de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. De plus, tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: La mère ambull s'enfouit dans le sol et fait sortir sa progéniture à la surface. Tant qu'elle est sous terre, elle ne peut pas être visée ni subir de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. De plus, tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} sont supprimés.

languages.text: アンブルマザーは、地中に潜り込み、地表に巣族を出現させる。アンブルマザーが地中にいる間、ターゲットにしたり、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを与え{/g}たりすることはできない。すべての{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}も取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: アンブルマザーは、地中に潜り込み、地表に巣族を出現させる。アンブルマザーが地中にいる間、ターゲットにしたり、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを与え{/g}たりすることはできない。すべての{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}も取り除かれる。

languages.text: Die Ambullenmutter gräbt sich in den Boden, um ihre Brut an die Oberfläche zu holen. Solange sie eingegraben ist, kann die Ambullenmutter nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}beschädigt{/g} werden. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden entfernt.
languages.original_text: The ambull mother burrows herself into the ground causing her brood to emerge on the surface. While underground, the ambull mother cannot be targeted or {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are also removed.

traits.locale_text: Die Ambullenmutter gräbt sich in den Boden, um ihre Brut an die Oberfläche zu holen. Solange sie eingegraben ist, kann die Ambullenmutter nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}beschädigt{/g} werden. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden entfernt.
